name: Connect GOV.UK Pay and GOV.UK Notify
description: Simple webhook handler to connect GOV.UK Pay and GOV.UK Notify

NOTIFY_API_KEY.description: Your Notify API key. For example my_test_key-26785a09-ab16-4eb0-8407-a37497a57506-3d844edf-8d35-48ac-975b-e847b4f122b0.

NOTIFY_TEMPLATE_ID.description: The template ID for the email to send. For example f33517ff-2a88-4f6e-b855-c550268ce08a.

NOTIFY_EMAIL_ADDRESS.description: The address to send emails to when payment events happen.
